info.author: Afu Sensi
info.name: Gameserver Analytics
info.description: Tracks gameserver analytics via gameanalytics.com's REST API. API documentation: restapidocs.gameanalytics.com

setting.name: *analytics_API_KEY
setting.desc: Game API key found in https://go.gameanalytics.com/home

setting.name: *analytics_API_SECRET
setting.desc: Game API secret found in https://go.gameanalytics.com/home

setting.name: *analytics_current_server
setting.desc: Sets the server so that the API knows where the requests are coming from.

setting.name: *analytics_sandbox
setting.desc: Run the resource in sandbox mode
